alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; New River Mesa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 6:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 715 PM MST... At 645 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carefree, or 10 miles southeast of New River, moving northwest at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, New River, Cave Creek, Carefree, Desert Mountain, Camp Creek, and Seven Springs. This includes AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 234 and 241. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; New River Mesa
